welcome.title: Welcome to Kuria mind
welcome.description_1: Welcome to our app! Create custom blocks to disable app access and notifications, so you can keep distractions at bay.
welcome.description_2: Boost your productivity by limiting interruptions. Stay focused on your tasks and achieve your goals with a distraction-free space.
welcome.permissions_message: We only need a few permissions to monitor apps and their notifications in order to close any unnecessary background processes. Your privacy is important and this apps DO NOT collect or share any personal data.

post_notifications.title: Post Notifications
post_notifications.description: Allow apps to post notifications in order to keep you informed about apps blocked

accesibility_services.title: Accessibility Services
accesibility_services.description: This permission is required to monitor apps in order to close them
accesibility_services.accept_description:
By enabling the accessibility service, you agree that Focus: Kuria Mind can monitor which apps you open in order to block selected ones and log their usage locally. Additionally, it will access system interfaces to provide functionalities such as strict mode. 
Rest assured, we will never access or share any of your personal data during this process.

notification_listener.title: Notification Listener
notification_listener.description: This permission is required to monitor notifications in order to close them

displayPopup.title: Display over other apps
displayPopup.description: This permission is required to show the block screen

delete_block.title: Are you sure you want to delete this block?

block.name: Name
block.blocked_apps_error: At least one app must be blocked
block.options_error: At least one option must be selected
block.time_error: End time must be greater than start time

settings.block_message_description: This message will be show when the app is blocked
